item.title: Check the value inside an array
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

For-each loop?

for (int i : twoHander) {
    if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == i) {
        // do stuff
    }
}

item.source: Check the value inside an array

item.title: Check the value inside an array
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

I need to know how check all the values inside an array of ints.

I have created this int.
(I plan to add more to this int so don’t humor at the number of elements it contains.)

	public static int[] twoHander = {14484};

And this “if statement”

		if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = twohander) {
			//actions here
		}

I need it to check all the values in the array so if the value in the array equals the equipment ID it will perform actions.

Read full topic
item.source: Check the value inside an array
